description: CD Genomics has extensive experience in providing support for the selection and design of microsatellite markers for a wide range of plant and animal species. Besides microsatellite genotyping, we also provide genotyping by sequencing (GBS) method, which saves time and resources. CD Genomics provides full microsatellite genotyping service package, including designing and ordering fluorescently labeled primer pairs, primer validation, microsatellite genotyping, as well as data analysis. We can tailor this pipeline to your research interest. If you have additional requirements or questions, please feel free to contact us.
name: Microsatellite Genotyping
